Capital.label: Banking Regulation, Total Capital, Actual
Capital.description: Amount of total capital as defined by regulatory framework.

ConcentrationRiskPercentage1.label: Concentration Risk, Percentage
ConcentrationRiskPercentage1.description: "For an entity that discloses a concentration risk in relation to quantitative amount, which serves as the ""benchmark"" (or denominator) in the equation, this concept represents the concentration percentage derived from the division."

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercisable, Weighted Average Remaining Contractual Term (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The weighted average period between the balance sheet date and expiration for all vested portions of options outstanding and currently exercisable (or convertible) under the plan, which may be expressed in a decimal value for number of years.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Expirations in Period
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of options or other stock instruments for which the right to exercise has lapsed under the terms of the plan agreements.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Expirations in Period, Weighted Average Exercise Price (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The weighted average price at which grantees could have acquired the underlying shares with respect to stock options of the plan that lapsed during the reporting period.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangements by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Expirations in Period, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.description: Weighted average price at which grantees could have acquired the underlying shares with respect to stock options of the plan that expired.

SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Outstanding, Weighted Average Remaining Contractual Term (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The weighted average period between the balance sheet date and expiration for all awards outstanding under the plan, which may be expressed in a decimal value for number of years.

SupplementaryLeverageRatio.label: Banking Regulation, Supplementary Leverage Ratio, Actual
SupplementaryLeverageRatio.description: Ratio of Tier 1 risk-based capital to total leverage exposure as defined by regulatory framework.

TierOneLeverageCapital.label: Banking Regulation, Tier One Leverage Capital, Actual
TierOneLeverageCapital.description: Amount of Tier 1 leverage capital as defined by regulatory framework.

TierOneRiskBasedCapital.label: Banking Regulation, Tier One Risk-Based Capital, Actual
TierOneRiskBasedCapital.description: Amount of Tier 1 risk-based capital as defined by regulatory framework.

TierTwoRiskBasedCapital.label: Banking Regulation, Tier Two Risk-Based Capital, Actual
TierTwoRiskBasedCapital.description: Amount of Tier 2 risk-based capital as defined by regulatory framework.

BankingRegulationCountercyclicalCapitalB.label: Banking Regulation, Countercyclical Capital Buffer
BankingRegulationCountercyclicalCapitalB.description: Countercyclical capital buffer percentage as defined by regulatory framework.

BankingRegulationGlobalSystemicallyImpor.label: Banking Regulation, Global Systemically Important Bank (GSIB) Surcharge
BankingRegulationGlobalSystemicallyImpor.description: Global systemically important bank (GSIB) surcharge percentage as defined by regulatory framework.

BankingRegulationSupplementaryLeverageRa.label: Banking Regulation, Supplementary Leverage Ratio, Capital Adequacy, Minimum
BankingRegulationSupplementaryLeverageRa.description: Ratio of minimum Tier 1 risk-based capital to total leverage exposure required for capital adequacy as defined by regulatory framework.

PreferredStockRedemptionPremium.label: Preferred Stock Redemption Premium
PreferredStockRedemptionPremium.description: The excess of (1) fair value of the consideration transferred to the holders of the preferred stock over (2) the carrying amount of the preferred stock in the registrant's balance sheet, during the accounting period.

BankingRegulationLeverageBufferMinimum.label: Banking Regulation, Leverage Buffer, Minimum
BankingRegulationLeverageBufferMinimum.description: Minimum leverage buffer percentage as defined by regulatory framework.

BankingRegulationSupplementaryLeverageRa.label: Banking Regulation, Supplementary Leverage Ratio, Well Capitalized, Minimum
BankingRegulationSupplementaryLeverageRa.description: Ratio of minimum Tier 1 risk-based capital to total leverage exposure categorized as well capitalized as defined by regulatory framework for prompt corrective action.
